email_content:
Hi Sarah,

Here’s a quick update on our current project:

• All milestones to date have been met as planned and we remain on schedule.
• The new algorithm has been integrated into the trading platform and is now in its final testing phase.
• No significant issues have been reported so far.
• Our next focus is preparing the documentation and training materials for the upcoming client workshop.

Please let me know if you’d like any additional details or have questions.

Best,
[Your Name]
